it.\""},{"lineNumber":216661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「覚えておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Remember this."},{"lineNumber":216662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前が婚姻を結ぶのは他の誰でもねえ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The one you marry will be no one else."},{"lineNumber":216663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この俺様だけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It will be me let out a loud laugh,"},{"lineNumber":216667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスは肩で風を切って去って行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Zansu swaggered away proudly."},{"lineNumber":216668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...\""},{"lineNumber":216669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだアイツはーーーーーーっ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What object!\""},{"lineNumber":216673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞は俺の相棒だぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eru> is my no, that's not it!"},{"lineNumber":216679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別にそーゆーんじゃねーよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not like that at figuratively!"},{"lineNumber":216681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てかハズいからこっち見んなよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"And please don’t look this way, it’s embarrassing!\""},{"lineNumber":216682,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故か長田君は照れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, Nagata-kun blushed."},{"lineNumber":216683,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはザンスに口説かれてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were hit on by day,"},{"lineNumber":216685,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君と城内を散歩していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"you were taking a walk inside the castle with Nagata-kun."},{"lineNumber":216686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜、まだ頭がガンガンするぅぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, my head is still staggering."},{"lineNumber":216692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、唐突に乳揉みだしたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, suddenly groping breasts,"},{"lineNumber":216693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の子を孕めって言い出したり、","translatedEnglishLine":"and then saying I should father his child,"},{"lineNumber":216694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にあいつ、ろくなもんじゃねえな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That guy really is no okay?"},{"lineNumber":216696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　隙を見せたら即襲われると思っとけよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you show any weakness, he’ll attack off."},{"lineNumber":216698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ったく、心配で目が離せねぇよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief, I can’t take my eyes off you because I’m worried.\""},{"lineNumber":216699,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君にとってあなたは目が離せないらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"For Nagata-kun, you are someone he can’t take his eyes off."},{"lineNumber":216700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、見ろよ、＜エール＞。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, look, <Eru>."},{"lineNumber":216701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤の軍が訓練してるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Red Army is training.\""},{"lineNumber":216702,"originalJapaneseLine":"中庭では大量の赤軍の兵が","translatedEnglishLine":"In the courtyard, a large number of Red Army soldiers"},{"lineNumber":216703,"originalJapaneseLine":"整然と並んで素振りを行っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were lined up orderly, practicing swings."},{"lineNumber":216704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら！　なんだそのへっぴり腰は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! What’s with that cowardly stance!"},{"lineNumber":216705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　テメェらやる気あんのか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you even serious about this?!"},{"lineNumber":216706,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスが叫ぶと、数百人はいる","translatedEnglishLine":"When Zansu shouted, hundreds of"},{"lineNumber":216707,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤の軍の兵士達が大音声で返事をし、","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Army soldiers shouted back in loud unison,"},{"lineNumber":216708,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけで空気がビリビリと震えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and just that made the air vibrate intensely."},{"lineNumber":216709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すげぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amazing..."},{"lineNumber":216710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、＜エール＞と大して年の差ない癖に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though he’s not much older than <Eru>,"},{"lineNumber":216711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうあんだけ大人達を従えてんのかよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he’s already commanding so many adults...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「家と血、王家の正統性を守る為にゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To protect the family, the bloodline, and the legitimacy of the royal family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身内でガキこさえるのが手っ取り早いからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's quickest to have children within the family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近親婚なんて歴史上、散々行われてきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consanguineous marriage has been practiced extensively throughout history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから俺はお前だけじゃねぇ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why it's not just you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子の連中にもガキ産ませるつもりだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also plan to have the children of the Demon Lord's offspring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はそれだけ伝えにきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came just to tell you that today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、焦らなくてもいずれお前の方から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, even if you don't rush, someday you'll come to me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 是非抱いてと言いにくるに決まってるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: begging to be embraced, no doubt about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「覚えておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Remember this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が婚姻を結ぶのは他の誰でもねえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one you marry will be no one else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様だけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be me alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, goodbye."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高笑いを上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He let out a loud laugh,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは肩で風を切って去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Zansu swaggered away proudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだアイツはーーーーーーっ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell is with that guyーーーーーー!!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「プンプン！　プンスカ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm so mad! Fuming!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女口説くにしたってあんな言い方あるかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there any way to talk to a woman like that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで＜エール＞を物みたいにー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like he was treating <Eru> like an object!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞は俺の相棒だぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Eru> is my partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな奴に嫁がせるくらいならなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd rather marry her myself than let her go to a guy like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が嫁にもらうっつーのー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm the one who's going to marry her!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ば、ばっか、ちげーよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no, that's not it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にそーゆーんじゃねーよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like that at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、言葉の綾っただけだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I was just speaking figuratively!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てかハズいからこっち見んなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And please don’t look this way, it’s embarrassing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か長田君は照れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Nagata-kun blushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスに口説かれてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were hit on by Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二日目の昼下がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the afternoon of the second day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と城内を散歩していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were taking a walk inside the castle with Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜、まだ頭がガンガンするぅぅ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, my head is still pounding..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当……昨日はひどい目に遭ったよな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really... we went through hell yesterday, didn't we..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もうあいつには近づかないようにしようぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's just not get near that guy again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ろくな目に遭う気がしねぇわ、俺。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a feeling nothing good will come of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うぐぅっ……」
長田君はフラフラだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun was staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、唐突に乳揉みだしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, suddenly groping breasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の子を孕めって言い出したり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then saying I should father his child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にあいつ、ろくなもんじゃねえな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That guy really is no good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、あの男は要注意だからな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen, that man is dangerous, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隙を見せたら即襲われると思っとけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you show any weakness, he’ll attack instantly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前ボーッとしてっからなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You’re always dazing off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ったく、心配で目が離せねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, I can’t take my eyes off you because I’m worried."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君にとってあなたは目が離せないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Nagata-kun, you are someone he can’t take his eyes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、見ろよ、＜エール＞。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, look, <Eru>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍が訓練してるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Army is training."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭では大量の赤軍の兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the courtyard, a large number of Red Army soldiers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 整然と並んで素振りを行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were lined up orderly, practicing swings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら！　なんだそのへっぴり腰は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! What’s with that cowardly stance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テメェらやる気あんのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you even serious about this?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスが叫ぶと、数百人はいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Zansu shouted, hundreds of

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍の兵士達が大音声で返事をし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army soldiers shouted back in loud unison,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで空気がビリビリと震えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and just that made the air vibrate intensely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すげぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ、＜エール＞と大して年の差ない癖に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though he’s not much older than <Eru>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうあんだけ大人達を従えてんのかよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he’s already commanding so many adults..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

What’s with that cowardly stance!"},{"lineNumber":216705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　テメェらやる気あんのか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you even serious about this?!"},{"lineNumber":216706,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスが叫ぶと、数百人はいる","translatedEnglishLine":"When Zansu shouted, hundreds of"},{"lineNumber":216707,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤の軍の兵士達が大音声で返事をし、","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Army soldiers shouted back in loud unison,"},{"lineNumber":216708,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけで空気がビリビリと震えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and just that made the air vibrate intensely."},{"lineNumber":216709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すげぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amazing..."},{"lineNumber":216710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、＜エール＞と大して年の差ない癖に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though he’s not much older than <Eru>,"},{"lineNumber":216711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうあんだけ大人達を従えてんのかよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he’s already commanding so many adults...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「家と血、王家の正統性を守る為にゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To protect the family, the bloodline, and the legitimacy of the royal family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身内でガキこさえるのが手っ取り早いからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's quickest to have children within the family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近親婚なんて歴史上、散々行われてきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consanguineous marriage has been practiced extensively throughout history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから俺はお前だけじゃねぇ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why it's not just you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子の連中にもガキ産ませるつもりだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also plan to have the children of the Demon Lord's offspring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はそれだけ伝えにきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came just to tell you that today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、焦らなくてもいずれお前の方から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, even if you don't rush, someday you'll come to me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 是非抱いてと言いにくるに決まってるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: begging to be embraced, no doubt about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「覚えておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Remember this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が婚姻を結ぶのは他の誰でもねえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one you marry will be no one else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様だけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be me alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, goodbye."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高笑いを上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He let out a loud laugh,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは肩で風を切って去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Zansu swaggered away proudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだアイツはーーーーーーっ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell is with that guyーーーーーー!!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「プンプン！　プンスカ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm so mad! Fuming!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女口説くにしたってあんな言い方あるかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there any way to talk to a woman like that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで＜エール＞を物みたいにー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like he was treating <Eru> like an object!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞は俺の相棒だぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Eru> is my partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな奴に嫁がせるくらいならなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd rather marry her myself than let her go to a guy like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が嫁にもらうっつーのー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm the one who's going to marry her!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ば、ばっか、ちげーよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no, that's not it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にそーゆーんじゃねーよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like that at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、言葉の綾っただけだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I was just speaking figuratively!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てかハズいからこっち見んなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And please don’t look this way, it’s embarrassing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か長田君は照れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Nagata-kun blushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスに口説かれてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were hit on by Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二日目の昼下がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the afternoon of the second day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と城内を散歩していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were taking a walk inside the castle with Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜、まだ頭がガンガンするぅぅ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, my head is still pounding..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当……昨日はひどい目に遭ったよな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really... we went through hell yesterday, didn't we..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もうあいつには近づかないようにしようぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's just not get near that guy again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ろくな目に遭う気がしねぇわ、俺。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a feeling nothing good will come of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うぐぅっ……」
長田君はフラフラだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun was staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、唐突に乳揉みだしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, suddenly groping breasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の子を孕めって言い出したり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then saying I should father his child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にあいつ、ろくなもんじゃねえな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That guy really is no good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、あの男は要注意だからな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen, that man is dangerous, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隙を見せたら即襲われると思っとけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you show any weakness, he’ll attack instantly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前ボーッとしてっからなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You’re always dazing off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ったく、心配で目が離せねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, I can’t take my eyes off you because I’m worried."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君にとってあなたは目が離せないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Nagata-kun, you are someone he can’t take his eyes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、見ろよ、＜エール＞。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, look, <Eru>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍が訓練してるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Army is training."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭では大量の赤軍の兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the courtyard, a large number of Red Army soldiers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 整然と並んで素振りを行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were lined up orderly, practicing swings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら！　なんだそのへっぴり腰は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! What’s with that cowardly stance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テメェらやる気あんのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you even serious about this?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスが叫ぶと、数百人はいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Zansu shouted, hundreds of

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍の兵士達が大音声で返事をし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army soldiers shouted back in loud unison,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで空気がビリビリと震えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and just that made the air vibrate intensely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すげぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ、＜エール＞と大して年の差ない癖に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though he’s not much older than <Eru>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうあんだけ大人達を従えてんのかよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he’s already commanding so many adults..."
